page.title: 15DURHAM MINERS GALA
page.content: Each year on a Saturday in July,the Miners Gala or Big Meeting is held. Representatives of the National Union of Mineworkers,their families and friends meet to affirm their solidarity with the Labour movement.Leaders of the N.U.M.and prestigious members of the Labour party make speeches on a dais on the Race Course.A large picnic takes place in the surounding area and a huge Fun Fair operates on the periphery. Although the Gala has been held for more than a hundred years the dwindling number of pits in the area has led to smaller numbers of people attending the Big Meeting.
